quiz.question: _________ gleam
quiz.explanation: 闪光, 月光闪光. The moonlight gleam reflected beautifully on the calm lake. 月光闪光在平静的湖面上美丽地反射。

quiz.question: _____ agleam
quiz.explanation: 闪闪发光, 剑闪闪发光. The knight's sword was agleam in the morning sun. 骑士的剑在晨光中闪闪发光。

quiz.question: ream __ _____
quiz.explanation: 令, 一令纸. She purchased a ream of paper for the office printer. 她为办公室打印机购买了一令纸。

quiz.question: ___ slipstream
quiz.explanation: 滑流, 喷气式飞机滑流. The racing car followed in the jet slipstream to increase speed. 赛车跟随喷气式飞机滑流以提高速度。

quiz.question: _____ sham
quiz.explanation: 赝品, 廉价赝品. The jewelry turned out to be a cheap sham. 这些珠宝原来是廉价赝品。

quiz.question: ___ bedlam
quiz.explanation: 混乱, 疯狂的混乱. The classroom descended into mad bedlam when the teacher left. 老师离开后,教室陷入疯狂的混乱。

quiz.question: roam ______
quiz.explanation: 漫游, 自由漫游. Wild animals would roam freely across the vast savanna. 野生动物会在广阔的草原上自由漫游。

quiz.question: cram ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 死记硬背, 为考试死记硬背. Students stayed up late to cram for the final exam. 学生们熬夜为期末考试死记硬背。

quiz.question: deem _________
quiz.explanation: 认为, 认为必要. The committee would deem the changes necessary for improvement. 委员会会认为这些改变对改进是必要的。

quiz.question: teem ____ ____
quiz.explanation: 充满, 充满生命. The coral reef would teem with colorful marine life. 珊瑚礁充满了色彩斑斓的海洋生命。

quiz.question: proclaim _______
quiz.explanation: 宣告, 宣告胜利. The general would proclaim victory after the decisive battle. 将军会在决定性战役后宣告胜利。

quiz.question: exclaim ______
quiz.explanation: 呼喊, 大声呼喊. The excited child began to exclaim loudly at the surprise. 兴奋的孩子开始对惊喜大声呼喊。

quiz.question: maim ______
quiz.explanation: 使残废, 使受害者残废. The explosion threatened to maim the victim permanently. 爆炸有可能使受害者永久残废。

quiz.question: skim ____
quiz.explanation: 撇去, 撇去牛奶. The dairy would skim milk to remove the cream. 乳品厂会撇去牛奶以去除奶油。

quiz.question: brim ____
quiz.explanation: 满溢, 满溢. The cup was filled to the brim with hot coffee. 杯子里盛满了热咖啡。

quiz.question: fathom _____
quiz.explanation: 测量, 测量深度. Sailors used a rope to fathom the depth of the harbor. 水手们用绳子测量港口的深度。

quiz.question: loom _____
quiz.explanation: 隐约出现, 隐约出现得很大. Dark storm clouds began to loom large on the horizon. 黑暗的暴风云开始在地平线上隐约出现得很大。

quiz.question: ____ gloom
quiz.explanation: 忧郁, 深深的忧郁. He fell into deep gloom after hearing the bad news. 听到坏消息后,他陷入深深的忧郁。

quiz.question: zoom __
quiz.explanation: 放大, 放大. The photographer would zoom in to capture the details. 摄影师会放大以捕捉细节。

quiz.question: bosom ______
quiz.explanation: 知己, 知己朋友. She confided her secrets to her bosom friend. 她向她的知己朋友吐露秘密。

quiz.question: ______ blossom
quiz.explanation: 开花, 春天开花. Cherry trees burst into beautiful spring blossoms. 樱桃树绽放出美丽的春天花朵。

quiz.question: accustom _______
quiz.explanation: 使习惯, 使自己习惯. It takes time to accustom oneself to a new environment. 需要时间让自己习惯新环境。

quiz.question: _____ forearm
quiz.explanation: 前臂, 人类前臂. The human forearm contains two main bones. 人类前臂包含两块主要骨头。

quiz.question: _________ smarm
quiz.explanation: 谄媚, 虚伪的谄媚. His insincere smarm made everyone uncomfortable. 他虚伪的谄媚让每个人都感到不舒服。

quiz.question: ___ swarm
quiz.explanation: 群, 蜜蜂群. A large bee swarm descended on the garden flowers. 一大群蜜蜂落在花园的花朵上。

quiz.question: squirm _____________
quiz.explanation: 扭动, 不舒服地扭动. The child began to squirm uncomfortably in the hard chair. 孩子在硬椅子上开始不舒服地扭动。

quiz.question: deform ____
quiz.explanation: 使变形, 使身体变形. The disease threatened to deform his body over time. 这种疾病有可能随着时间使他的身体变形。

quiz.question: _______ sarcasm
quiz.explanation: 讽刺, 尖刻的讽刺. Her cutting sarcasm wounded his pride deeply. 她尖刻的讽刺深深伤害了他的自尊心。

quiz.question: ____ chasm
quiz.explanation: 裂缝, 深深的裂缝. A deep chasm separated the two mountain peaks. 一道深深的裂缝分隔了两座山峰。

quiz.question: ______ spasm
quiz.explanation: 痉挛, 肌肉痉挛. The runner suffered a painful muscle spasm in his leg. 跑步者的腿部遭受了疼痛的肌肉痉挛。

quiz.question: heroism ___
quiz.explanation: 英雄主义, 英雄主义行为. The firefighter's heroism act saved many lives. 消防员的英雄主义行为拯救了许多生命。

quiz.question: _______ rheumatism
quiz.explanation: 风湿病, 慢性风湿病. The elderly patient suffered from chronic rheumatism. 这位老年患者患有慢性风湿病。

quiz.question: favoritism ______
quiz.explanation: 偏袒, 偏袒政策. The manager's favoritism policy created resentment among staff. 经理的偏袒政策在员工中引起了怨恨。

quiz.question: _______ paroxysm
quiz.explanation: 突发, 剧烈突发. He was seized by a violent paroxysm of coughing. 他被剧烈的咳嗽突发所困扰。

quiz.question: ____ scum
quiz.explanation: 浮渣, 池塘浮渣. Green pond scum covered the stagnant water surface. 绿色的池塘浮渣覆盖了停滞的水面。

quiz.question: ____ pandemonium
quiz.explanation: 大混乱, 疯狂的大混乱. Wild pandemonium broke out when the team won the championship. 当球队赢得冠军时,爆发了疯狂的大混乱。

quiz.question: ______ hoodlum
quiz.explanation: 流氓, 街头流氓. The street hoodlum terrorized the neighborhood residents. 这个街头流氓恐吓邻里居民。

quiz.question: ____ glum
quiz.explanation: 闷闷不乐的, 看起来闷闷不乐. He would look glum after receiving disappointing news. 收到令人失望的消息后,他会看起来闷闷不乐。

quiz.question: ____ candelabrum
quiz.explanation: 烛台, 金烛台. The ornate gold candelabrum decorated the dining table. 华丽的金烛台装饰着餐桌。

quiz.question: _____ scrum
quiz.explanation: 混战, 橄榄球混战. The players formed a tight rugby scrum during the match. 球员们在比赛中形成了紧密的橄榄球混战。

quiz.question: ____ turban
quiz.explanation: 头巾, 丝绸头巾. The merchant wore an elegant silk turban. 商人戴着优雅的丝绸头巾。

quiz.question: ____ toboggan
quiz.explanation: 雪橇, 骑雪橇. Children loved to ride the toboggan down snowy hills. 孩子们喜欢骑雪橇滑下雪山。

quiz.question: ____ cardigan
quiz.explanation: 开襟羊毛衫, 羊毛开襟羊毛衫. She wore a cozy wool cardigan on the chilly evening. 在寒冷的晚上,她穿着舒适的羊毛开襟羊毛衫。

quiz.question: reptilian ____
quiz.explanation: 爬行动物的, 爬行动物的眼睛. The villain was described as having cold reptilian eyes. 这个反派被描述为有冷酷的爬行动物眼睛。

quiz.question: ______ disciplinarian
quiz.explanation: 纪律严明者, 严格的纪律严明者. The headmaster was known as a strict disciplinarian. 校长以严格的纪律严明者而闻名。

quiz.question: _____ horseman
quiz.explanation: 骑马者, 勇敢的骑马者. The brave horseman rode fearlessly into battle. 勇敢的骑马者无畏地冲入战斗。

quiz.question: ______ hangman
quiz.explanation: 刽子手, 公共刽子手. The public hangman carried out executions in the town square. 公共刽子手在镇广场执行处决。

quiz.question: ____ yeoman
quiz.explanation: 自耕农, 自由自耕农. The free yeoman owned and worked his own land. 自由自耕农拥有并耕种自己的土地。

quiz.question: ________ barman
quiz.explanation: 酒吧招待, 友好的酒吧招待. The friendly barman served drinks with a smile. 友好的酒吧招待微笑着供应饮料。

quiz.question: ________ merman
quiz.explanation: 人鱼, 神话中的人鱼. Ancient tales spoke of a mythical merman living in the sea. 古老的故事讲述了一个生活在海里的神话人鱼。

quiz.question: _____ talisman
quiz.explanation: 护身符, 幸运护身符. She carried a lucky talisman for protection. 她带着一个幸运护身符以求保护。

quiz.question: chessman _____
quiz.explanation: 棋子, 国际象棋棋子. Each chessman piece has specific moves on the board. 每个国际象棋棋子在棋盘上都有特定的走法。

quiz.question: nonhuman _______
quiz.explanation: 非人类的, 非人类灵长类动物. Scientists studied the behavior of nonhuman primates. 科学家们研究非人类灵长类动物的行为。

quiz.question: moan ______
quiz.explanation: 呻吟, 轻声呻吟. The injured patient would moan softly in pain. 受伤的病人会因疼痛而轻声呻吟。

quiz.question: bemoan ____
quiz.explanation: 哀叹, 哀叹命运. He would constantly bemoan his unfortunate fate. 他会不断哀叹自己不幸的命运。

quiz.question: roan _____
quiz.explanation: 杂色的, 杂色马. The cowboy rode a beautiful roan horse across the prairie. 牛仔骑着一匹漂亮的杂色马穿过草原。

quiz.question: groan __ ____
quiz.explanation: 呻吟, 痛苦地呻吟. The wounded soldier began to groan in pain. 受伤的士兵开始痛苦地呻吟。

quiz.question: ____ __ saucepan
quiz.explanation: 炖锅, 在炖锅中烹饪. She would cook the pasta in a large saucepan. 她会在一个大炖锅中烹饪意大利面。

quiz.question: dustpan _____
quiz.explanation: 簸箕, 簸箕刷子. She used the dustpan and brush to clean up the mess. 她用簸箕和刷子清理了混乱。

quiz.question: ___ suntan
quiz.explanation: 晒黑, 太阳晒黑. She wanted to get a healthy sun tan at the beach. 她想在海滩上晒成健康的肤色。

quiz.question: ________ tartan
quiz.explanation: 格子呢, 苏格兰格子呢. He wore traditional Scottish tartan at the wedding. 他在婚礼上穿着传统的苏格兰格子呢。

quiz.question: deaden ____
quiz.explanation: 减轻, 减轻疼痛. The medication helped deaden the chronic pain. 药物帮助减轻慢性疼痛。

quiz.question: leaden _____
quiz.explanation: 铅灰色的, 铅灰色的天空. Dark leaden skies threatened a heavy rainstorm. 黑暗的铅灰色天空预示着大暴雨。

quiz.question: overladen ____
quiz.explanation: 超载的, 超载的船. The overladen ship struggled in the rough seas. 超载的船在波涛汹涌的海上挣扎前行。

quiz.question: redden ______
quiz.explanation: 变红, 脸颊变红. Embarrassment caused her cheeks to redden quickly. 尴尬使她的脸颊迅速变红。

quiz.question: downtrodden ______
quiz.explanation: 受压迫的, 受压迫的人民. The revolution gave hope to downtrodden people everywhere. 革命给各地受压迫的人民带来了希望。

quiz.question: sodden _______
quiz.explanation: 湿透的, 湿透的衣服. Her sodden clothes dripped water all over the floor. 她湿透的衣服把水滴了一地。

quiz.question: ________ spleen
quiz.explanation: 脾脏, 肿大的脾脏. The doctor detected an enlarged spleen during the examination. 医生在检查时发现了肿大的脾脏。

quiz.question: ___ careen
quiz.explanation: 倾斜, 汽车倾斜. The out-of-control car began to careen down the hill. 失控的汽车开始倾斜着冲下山坡。

quiz.question: preen ________
quiz.explanation: 整理, 整理羽毛. Birds would carefully preen their feathers to stay clean. 鸟类会仔细整理羽毛以保持清洁。

quiz.question: ____ tureen
quiz.explanation: 汤碗, 汤碗. The elegant soup tureen sat in the center of the table. 优雅的汤碗放在桌子中央。

quiz.question: stiffen ____
quiz.explanation: 变僵硬, 身体变僵硬. Fear caused his body to stiffen with tension. 恐惧使他的身体因紧张而变僵硬。

quiz.question: ashen ____
quiz.explanation: 苍白的, 苍白的脸. His ashen face revealed the shock he felt. 他苍白的脸显露出他感到的震惊。

quiz.question: earthen ___
quiz.explanation: 陶制的, 陶罐. The ancient earthen pot was carefully excavated. 这个古老的陶罐被小心地挖掘出来。

quiz.question: oaken _____
quiz.explanation: 橡木的, 橡木桌. The massive oaken table dominated the dining room. 巨大的橡木桌占据了餐厅的主导地位。

quiz.question: reawaken ________
quiz.explanation: 重新唤起, 重新唤起兴趣. The documentary helped reawaken public interest in history. 这部纪录片帮助重新唤起公众对历史的兴趣。

quiz.question: slacken _____
quiz.explanation: 放慢, 放慢速度. The driver began to slacken speed as he approached the corner. 司机在接近拐角时开始放慢速度。

quiz.question: bracken ____
quiz.explanation: 蕨类, 蕨类植物. Dense bracken ferns covered the forest floor. 茂密的蕨类植物覆盖着森林地面。

quiz.question: stricken __ _______
quiz.explanation: 受打击的, 被疾病打击. The village was stricken by a devastating disease. 这个村庄被毁灭性的疾病打击。

quiz.question: sicken _______
quiz.explanation: 使生病, 迅速使生病. Contaminated food could sicken people quickly. 受污染的食物可能迅速使人生病。

quiz.question: silken ______
quiz.explanation: 丝绸般的, 丝绸般的线. The spider spun a web from silken thread. 蜘蛛用丝绸般的线织网。

quiz.question: unspoken ____
quiz.explanation: 未说出的, 未说出的规则. There was an unspoken rule about not discussing politics. 有一条关于不讨论政治的未说出的规则。

quiz.question: outspoken ______
quiz.explanation: 直言不讳的, 直言不讳的批评家. The outspoken critic never hesitated to voice her opinions. 这位直言不讳的批评家从不犹豫表达她的意见。

quiz.question: unbroken ______
quiz.explanation: 未被打破的, 未被打破的记录. The athlete maintained an unbroken record of victories. 这位运动员保持着未被打破的胜利记录。

quiz.question: crestfallen _____
quiz.explanation: 垂头丧气的, 垂头丧气的失败者. The crestfallen loser left the competition quietly. 垂头丧气的失败者悄悄离开了比赛。

quiz.question: swollen _____
quiz.explanation: 肿胀的, 肿胀的脚踝. The sprained ankle became badly swollen overnight. 扭伤的脚踝一夜之间严重肿胀。

quiz.question: sullen ____
quiz.explanation: 闷闷不乐的, 闷闷不乐的心情. The teenager was in a sullen mood all weekend. 这个青少年整个周末都处于闷闷不乐的心情。

quiz.question: misshapen ____
quiz.explanation: 畸形的, 畸形的肢体. The birth defect resulted in a misshapen limb. 这个先天缺陷导致了畸形的肢体。

quiz.question: deepen _______
quiz.explanation: 加深, 加深谜团. New clues only served to deepen the mystery further. 新线索只会进一步加深谜团。

quiz.question: pigpen _____
quiz.explanation: 猪圈, 猪圈围栏. The farmer repaired the broken pigpen fence. 农民修理了破损的猪圈围栏。

quiz.question: dampen __________
quiz.explanation: 抑制, 抑制热情. Bad weather failed to dampen their enthusiasm for the trip. 恶劣天气未能抑制他们对旅行的热情。

quiz.question: straighten __
quiz.explanation: 弄直, 弄直. She needed to straighten up her messy room. 她需要弄直她凌乱的房间。

quiz.question: heighten _________
quiz.explanation: 提高, 提高意识. The campaign aimed to heighten public awareness about health. 这项运动旨在提高公众对健康的意识。

quiz.question: lighten ____
quiz.explanation: 减轻, 减轻负担. They decided to lighten the load by removing unnecessary items. 他们决定通过去除不必要的物品来减轻负担。

quiz.question: frighten ________
quiz.explanation: 使害怕, 使孩子们害怕. The loud thunder would frighten young children at night. 响亮的雷声会在夜间使年幼的孩子们害怕。

quiz.question: hearten __________
quiz.explanation: 鼓舞, 鼓舞支持者. The victory would hearten supporters before the final match. 这场胜利会在决赛前鼓舞支持者。

quiz.question: hasten _________
quiz.explanation: 加快, 加快离开. Bad weather forced them to hasten their departure. 恶劣天气迫使他们加快离开。

quiz.question: glisten ____ ___
quiz.explanation: 闪耀, 因露水而闪耀. The grass would glisten with morning dew at sunrise. 草地在日出时会因晨露而闪耀。

quiz.question: christen ____
quiz.explanation: 命名, 命名船. The queen would christen the new ship at the ceremony. 女王会在仪式上为新船命名。

quiz.question: smitten ____ ____
quiz.explanation: 被迷住, 被爱迷住. He was completely smitten with love at first sight. 他第一眼就被爱完全迷住了。
